dataset_id: SMAPVEX12 Vegetation Water Content Map V001
organizations: NASA DAAC at the National Snow and Ice Data Center
title: SMAPVEX12 Vegetation Water Content Map V001
summary: This data set contains the vegetation water content map derived by calculating Normalized Difference Water Index (NDWI) from SPOT and RapidEye satellite imagery as part of the Soil Moisture Active Passive Validation Experiment 2012 (SMAPVEX12).

cmr.title: SMAPVEX12 Vegetation Water Content Map V001
cmr.summary: This data set contains the vegetation water content map derived by calculating Normalized Difference Water Index (NDWI) from SPOT and RapidEye satellite imagery as part of the Soil Moisture Active Passive Validation Experiment 2012 (SMAPVEX12).
